title: Minecraft Java版 18w31a 发布
author: what_name
txt_content:
本帖最后由 what_name 于 2018-8-5 10:57 编辑 

每周快照是Minecraft的测试机制，主要用于下一个正式版的特性预览。
然而，每周快照主要用于新特性展示，通常存在大量漏洞。因此对于普通玩家建议仅做测试尝鲜用。使用测试版打开存档前请务必备份。 适用于正式版的Mod不兼容快照，且大多数Mod都不对每周快照提供支持。
Minecraft 1.13.1 仍未发布，18w31a为其第3个预览版。
转载本贴时须要注明原作者以及本帖地址。




Surviving the heat? Most of the Java team are on holiday/on fire. But we still managed to release a snapshot. Pretty impressive, no?
活在炎热的天气中？Java团队大多数人都在度假或被高温折磨。但是我们仍然在想方设法发布新的快照。难道这不感人吗？



18w31a的更新Optimized performance性能优化Fish now have a 5% chance of dropping bonemeal when killed鱼在被击杀时有5%的几率掉落骨粉Conduits are properly waterlogged潮涌核心可以正确地被水覆盖Bonemeal used in water now has a chance to grow coral in warm ocean biomes在暖洋群系使用骨粉有几率长出珊瑚Squids now only spawn in rivers and oceans鱿鱼仅在河流和海洋中生成Added a concept of force-loaded chunks to the game, and a command (/chunk) to toggle force-loading on and off添加了强制加载区块的功能，以及一条命令(/chunk)来切换强制加载




18w31a修复的BUG
MC-73 - Green arrow bug on maps in frames地图在展示框中无法显示正确的绿箭头MC-1528 - Maps in item frames' markers aren't persistent展示框中的地图标记不是永久的MC-112801 - Players on the death screen still cause spawners to spawn.停留在死亡界面的玩家仍然会导致刷怪笼生怪MC-122939 - Statistics for mining banners and beds never increase破坏旗帜和床的统计信息永远不会增加MC-128547 - Minecraft keeps previously used World in memory if the player has hit any entity in that world如果玩家击打世界中的任何实体, 游戏将会使用事先储存的内存加载世界MC-130258 - Maps in item frames show shading problems地图在展示框上的光影错误MC-133181 - Observer Cooldown is broken观察者的冷却无效MC-134105 - Can't return from the end after defeating dragon击杀末影龙后无法从末地返回主世界MC-134159 - Saved world causes crash in 1.13保存地图时游戏崩溃MC-134667 - Async Chunk Gen dangerously adding entities to world async异步区块生成器使用危险的方法异步生成实体MC-134716 - Minecraft Multiplayer – Player kick exploit多人游戏中踢出玩家后出错(???)MC-134832 - TNT with unstable=true blockstate is ignited instead of broken in creative mode创造模式下，TNT方块当unstable=true时会被点燃MC-134889 - Iron golems spawn in air blocks铁傀儡在空气中生成MC-134898 - Pressing Escape no longer returns to main menu from singleplayer menu按下退出不再从单人游戏菜单返回到主菜单MC-134916 - Sound event block.pumpkin.carve doesn't play when carving normal pumpkins雕刻南瓜时没有播放block.pumpkin.carve声音MC-134967 - NullPointerException when placing Wither Skeleton Skulls放置凋零骷髅头的时候触发NullPointerException错误MC-134982 - Exception when placing a command block放置命令方块时游戏报错MC-134987 - Renaming a world doesn't update its name until re-entering the world list在重新进入单人游戏菜单之前，已被重命名后的世界的信息不会立即被更新MC-134988 - Optimizing a world doesn't update it until re-entering the world list在重新进入单人游戏菜单之前，已被优化（升级）后的世界的信息不会立即被更新MC-135049 - Old world doesn't save map markers in 1.13旧存档中的地图标记在1.13中不会被保存MC-135053 - Sticky pistons get stuck when receiving a 0 gametick pulse粘性活塞在接收到0gt脉冲时会卡住MC-135136 - Crash when placing a chain command block with set command放置带有命令的连锁命令方块时游戏崩溃MC-135172 - Under certain conditions pistons can't be powered for the first 2 gameticks after being moved在某些条件下(图片 YT视频)，活塞移动的2gt内不能被激活MC-135185 - All redstone components can become stuck in a powered state when indirectly unpowered所有红石元件会在高速开关信号后变为未激活状态MC-135186 - Pistons can only be re-pulsed 5 or more gameticks later.活塞只能在5gt后被再次激活MC-135194 - Pistons react 1 gametick too late活塞反应晚了1gtMC-135261 - /setblock for player heads don't show the texture after the placement通过/setblock放置玩家头颅时不显示材质
